statements: SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT policyholder_id, name, address FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM policyholders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT policyholder_id, contact_details FROM policyholders WHERE contact_details IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id > 5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Lane%' AND contact_details IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, address, contact_details FROM policyholders WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY address;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policyholders FROM policyholders;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM Policyholders ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE policy_amount > 1000;
SELECT policyholder_id, policy_type FROM Policies WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT name, address, contact_details FROM Policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_amount FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT name, address, policy_type FROM Policyholders INNER JOIN Policies ON Policyholders.policyholder_id = Policies.policyholder_id;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_amount FROM policies ORDER BY policy_amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE policy_id = 2;
SELECT policyholder_id, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM claims GROUP BY policyholder_id ORDER BY total_claims DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT ph.name, po.policy_type, po.policy_amount FROM policyholders ph JOIN policies po ON ph.id = po.policyholder_id;
SELECT c.claim_id, p.policy_type, c.claim_amount FROM claims c LEFT JOIN policies p ON c.policy_id = p.policy_id WHERE c.claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT ph.name, COUNT(c.claim_id) AS num_claims FROM policyholders ph LEFT JOIN claims c ON ph.id = c.policy_id GROUP BY ph.name HAVING num_claims > 3 ORDER BY num_claims DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_type, policy_amount FROM policies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT beneficiary_name FROM beneficiaries WHERE policy_id = 1 ORDER BY beneficiary_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, MAX(amount) AS max_payment FROM payments GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT policies.policy_id, policy_type, policy_amount, name AS policyholder_name FROM policies JOIN policyholders ON policies.policyholder_id = policyholders.id WHERE policy_amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date, policy_type FROM payments JOIN policies ON payments.policy_id = policies.policy_id WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT beneficiary_id, beneficiary_name, policy_type FROM beneficiaries JOIN policies ON beneficiaries.policy_id = policies.policy_id WHERE beneficiary_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders;
SELECT policy_type, policy_amount FROM policies WHERE policy_amount > 1000;
SELECT beneficiary_name, relationship FROM beneficiaries WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_amount FROM policies WHERE policy_amount > 1000;
SELECT beneficiary_name, relationship FROM beneficiaries WHERE relationship = 'Spouse' ORDER BY beneficiary_name;

SELECT policyholders.name, policies.policy_type, beneficiaries.relationship FROM policyholders JOIN beneficiaries ON policyholders.id = beneficiaries.policy_id JOIN policies ON policyholders.id = policies.policy_id;

SELECT policyholders.id, policyholders.name, policies.policy_type, premiums.premium_amount FROM policyholders LEFT JOIN policies ON policyholders.id = policies.policy_id LEFT JOIN premiums ON policyholders.id = premiums.policy_id WHERE premium_amount IS NOT NULL ORDER BY premiums.payment_date DESC;
